title: 42: The SIMPLY 6 Episode: 6 Ingredients, Questions Answered & More!
itunes:title: The SIMPLY 6 Episode: 6 Ingredients, Questions Answered & More!
description: It’s finally here — Lisa's new book, Hungry Girl Simply 6: All-Natural Recipes With 6 Ingredients Or Less! Get a sneak peek of the new recipes and so much more. Lisa dishes on how she came up with the concept for the book and how it’s different from her other books! Plus, we answer fan questions about Simply 6, ask the HG staffers for their favorite recipes, and try a few of their favorite dishes! Everything you need to know about SIMPLY 6 is in this episode! [hungry-girl.com/foodcast](http://hungry-girl.com/foodcast)
